attributes.action: Ban the hitting of horses in horse racing.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Horses are abused and neglected and sorely misunderstood. We need to learn more and approach their care with more intelligence.

The act of hitting horses, allowed by the government, for entertainment, sends a message to the population that violence is acceptable.

We don't allow the beating of cats or dogs in sport, so why horses.

The practice is archaic and suggests we are still a way from being civilised.

I personally feel we have to have zero tolerance approach to violence to protect the vulnerable-human animal as well as non-human.


Is the will to stop violence too advanced an idea in 2007?
